posts.post_content:
I'm looking for the following cards of players who spent part of their career in Columbus, Ohio. VG to EX, Raw or Graded (PSA/SGC), No Paper Loss, No Trimming, No Creasing Through Player

Current list:

T201: Downs/Odwell
T204: Gus Dorner, Bob Ganley, Doc Gessler, Charlie Hemphill, Mike Kahoe, Jack Pfiester
T205: Johnny Nee
T207: Huge Bradley, Lefty George, Elmer Knetzer, Red Nelson, Heine Wagner
T209-1: Joe Walsh
T209-2: Rube Eldridge
T210-1: Elmer Bensen
T210-6: John Scheneberg
T211: Charlie Babb
T212-3: Fred Abbott, Art Bues, Paul Strand, Deacon Van Buren
T213-1: Will "George C." Scoops Carey & Jimmy Hart
T213-2: Rube Geyer
T222: Nemo Leibold, Eddie Murphy, Ivy Wingo


PM or email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url], anything you have available
